page.title: 15A DAY AT RHUM PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content:
I get up in the morning at 8 o'clock and go downstairs and have my breakfast. I leave for school at 8.30am.
School starts at 9 o'clock. Most days I do maths., reading, activity work and stories. I also work on the computer, play the recorder and knit. I watch some television programmes and listen to the radio.
When it is playtime we all go outside and play games like Stuck In The Mud, Freeze and chases.
We go home for lunch at 12.15pm and come back at 1.30pm. School finishes at half past three.
{By Juliette, age 7.
